description:
Do you need your B1 English Certificate? Are you nervous about the speaking part of the exam? You need to know exactly what to expect in your speaking exam. I have prepared a proven step-by-step guide of what to expect and how to pass the Cambridge Preliminary English Test (PET Exam). Steps to Success in B1 Speaking is dedicated to help you pass the Speaking part of the exam. You will have exercises and tips that I have used in my classrooms.

You will receive:

- Detailed explanation of the parts of the PET Speaking Exam

- Essential skills necessary to communicate more effectively

- Strategies of how to prepare for and take the exam

- Tips on how to excel in each part of the exam

- Language analysis of which language to focus on in each part of the exam

- Guidance on how to express yourself effectively

- Guided and Free practices for the parts of the exam

- Quizzes to test yourself through each part

- Exercises and examples to practice the language that is taught in the course

Included in this course:

Over 85 minutes of interactive lessons

27 lectures

19 videos

19 pages of worksheets and exercises

5 quizzes

2 full practice tests

An 8-week intensive study program

A grid chart to track your progress

Expert advice and support

Study and test-taking tips

Strategies for success

Step-by-step breakdown of the exam

Much more!
title: Steps to Success in B1 Speaking
